entry.title: Russia's Black Sea Flagship Abandoned After Ukraine Claims Missile Strike Sank It
entry.content: The missile cruiser Moskva was abandoned by its crew after its ammunition blew up, Russiaâ€™s Defense Ministry said. Ukrainian officials said their forces hit the ship with cruise missiles.

entry.title: The Secret of Ukraine's Military Success: Years of NATO Training
entry.content: Extensive programs have taught thousands of soldiers, plus military brass and lawmakers overseeing the armed forces, how to transform from a rigid Soviet-style force into a modern army that thinks on the move.
